price: E, quando eles Nos indignaram, vingamo-nos deles; então, afogamo-los todos.
arabic: فَلَمَّآ ءَاسَفُونَا ٱنتَقَمۡنَا مِنۡهُمۡ فَأَغۡرَقۡنَٰهُمۡ أَجۡمَعِينَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: falammā āsafūnā intaqamnā min'hum fa-aghraqnāhum ajmaʿīna
